qas.question: What scan format is also included in MBAFF?
What was viewed by some as enhanced television format and not true HDTV format?

What was viewed by some as enhanced television format and not true SDTV format?

context: It also includes the alternative <a0_0><b4_0>1440×1152<b4_0/> HDMAC<a0_0/> scan format. (According to some reports, <a1_0>a <b5_0>mooted 750-line<b5_0/><a1_0/> (720p) format (720 progressively scanned lines) was viewed by some at the ITU as <a2_0>an <b6_0>enhanced television format<b6_0/><a2_0/> rather than a true HDTV format, and so was not included, although 1920×1080i and 1280×720p systems for a range of frame and field rates were defined by several <a3_0><b7_0>US SMPTE standards<b7_0/><a3_0/>.)
